p: On the other hand, various compounds have been isolated from the roots of Croton macrostachyus including, 3β-acetoxy taraxer-14-en-28-oic acid, trachyloban-19-oic acid, trachyloban-18-oic acid, neoclerodan-5, 10-en-19, 6β; 20, 12-diolide, 3α, 19-dihydroxytrachylobane, and 3α, 18, 19-trihydroxytrachylobane. 56 Thus, the hepatoprotective activity of the extracts could also be due to the presence of these compounds.
